title: Approval
subtitle: Review and Manage Requests
description: The Approval screen allows managers to review, approve, or reject various employee requests, including leave, overtime, expenses, and task completions.

title: On Site Activity
subtitle: Capture Real-Time Events
description: Spot Activity captures real-time events or actions that occur spontaneously. It helps in tracking immediate issues or tasks requiring urgent attention.

title: Time Sheet
subtitle: Log Work Hours & Tasks
description: The Time Sheet module allows employees to record daily work hours, assigned tasks, and project contributions, enabling accurate payroll and productivity tracking.
